#include <algorithm>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#define s(n)    scanf("%d",&n);
#define p(n)    printf("%d\n",n);
 
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
    int T;
    cin>>T;
    while(T--)
    {
        int N;
        cin>>N;
        vector < pair <int,int> > odk;
        for(int i=0; i<N; i++)
        {
            int x,y;
            s(x);s(y);
            odk.push_back(make_pair(x,y));
        }
        int cou = 0;
        sort(odk.begin(),odk.end());
        odk.push_back(*odk.rbegin());
//        for(int i=0; i<odk.size();i++)
//           cout<<odk[i].first<<" "<<odk[i].second<<endl;
        int px = odk[0].first;
        int py = odk[0].second;
        for(int i=1; i<=N; i++)
        {
            int cx = odk[i].first;
            int cy = odk[i].second;
//            cout<<"cou: "<<cou<<endl;
//            cout<<"px: "<<px<<" py: "<<py<<endl;
//            cout<<"cx: "<<cx<<" cy: "<<cy<<endl;
            if(cx < py)
            {
                if(i == N)
                    cou++;
                if(cy > py)
                {
                    px = cx;
                    py = py;
                }
                else if(cy == py)
                {
                    px = cx;
                    py = py;
                }
                else if(cy < py)
                {
                    px = cx;
                    py = cy;
                }
 
            }
            else if(cx == py)
            {
                if(i == N)
                    cou++;
                px = cx;
                py = cx;
            }
            else
            {
                px = cx;
                py = cy;
                cou ++;
            }
 
        }
        if(cou)
        {
            p(cou);
        }
        else
            p(1);
    }
    return 0;
}
